content.p: The Careers Advisory Service (CAS) has collaborated with Forage to offer all UNM students with practical work experience through a variety of free Virtual Work Experience Programs. Forage is an online resource which offers virtual experience programs designed by leading companies. Develop your skills and gain a real understanding of different roles and industries by working through these self-paced modules, with tasks similar to those you would undertake during a traditional internship. There are no lengthy application processes as programs are free and accessible to all UNM students and alumni. Simply pick your program, create an account on the Forage website and get started right away. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
